ovdesc.p: To generate MT565 Messages for a single Entitlement or a group of Entitlements even before the Entitlement is authorised.

desc.p: This field should hold a valid SUB.ACCOUNT number relating to DEPOSITORY defined in the DEPOSITORY field of the Application.This is an Optional field.
This field should hold a valid CUSTOMER.SECURITY id which is defined as DEPOSITORY in the Customer type.This is a Mandatory field.
This field should hold a valid DIARY.ID .This is a Mandatory field.
